messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Waah! Now! Just now!
I was just about to reel it in!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
You need to have more respect for
a grown-up...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Go on. Don’t be shy about going up to
people to hear what they have to say...Just don’t you talk to me.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Waah! Now! Just now!
I was just about to reel it in!...Right. You again!
